description:
image/jpeg: for progressive JPEGs, the first SOS segment doesn't
necessarily contain all components.

Fixes issue 4975.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=91db139d15e5 ***

image/jpeg: for progressive JPEGs, the first SOS segment doesn't
necessarily contain all components.

Fixes issue 4975.

R=r, minux.ma, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
https://codereview.appspot.com/7469043

Hello r@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/go/

On Tue, Mar 5, 2013 at 8:09 AM, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:

> tests?


Presumably the code in the bug no longer crashes.

For copyright and disk reasons, we don't want to put every JPEG into the
repo.

On Wed, Mar 6, 2013 at 12:12 AM, Brad Fitzpatrick <bradfitz@golang.org>wrote:

> On Tue, Mar 5, 2013 at 8:09 AM, minux <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:
>
>> tests?
>
>
> Presumably the code in the bug no longer crashes.
>
> For copyright and disk reasons, we don't want to put every JPEG into the
> repo.
>
OKay, I see.
